title: Blood Curse
description: Dorothy Kimble is an eager young college student with great grades and a passion for history. But Dorothy's no ordinary, innocent college kid: she's a conjurer. Descended from a long line of patrons of the spirits, her family safeguards the customs of their ancestors who grant them their powerful magic through their concentrated earthbound spiritual energy. Nearly a year after the death of Dorothy's beloved grandmother, she is pulled back into her Midwestern hometown only to find her fellow conjurers in distress. Bound by a curse brought upon by harvesters, users of dark blood magic, the congregation is in need of Dorothy's assistance. The alternative is falling victim to the sacrificial rituals of the harvesters.
author: D.L. Smith-Lee
